# Project 1

Indl√¶ser data
```{r}
library(zoo)



data <- get(load("armdata.Rdata"))[5][[1]]
x <- data[[1]][[2]]
person <- 10
rep <- 10
x <- c()
y <- c()
z <- c()
for (p in 1:person){
  for (r in 1:rep){
    
    longitude <- data[[p]][[r]][,1]
    x <- cbind(x,longitude)
  }
}
for (p in 1:person){
  for (r in 1:rep){
    
    transversal <- data[[p]][[r]][,2]
    y <- cbind(y,transversal)
  }
}
for (p in 1:person){
  for (r in 1:rep){
    
    vertical <- data[[p]][[r]][,3]
    z <- cbind(z,vertical)
  }
}
x <- t(na.locf(x, fromLast = T))
y <- t(na.locf(y, fromLast = T))
z <- t(na.locf(z, fromLast = T))
colnames <- c("persons","reps", paste0("x_", 1:100),paste0("y_", 1:100),paste0("z_", 1:100))
rownames <- c(rep("person1", 10),rep("person2", 10),rep("person3", 10),rep("person4", 10),rep("person5", 10),rep("person6", 10),rep("person7", 10),rep("person8", 10),rep("person9", 10),rep("person10", 10))
reps <- rep(1:10,10)
data_wide <- as.data.frame(cbind(rownames,reps,x,y,z))

names(data_wide) <- colnames
```
